page.title: 05EMPLOYMENT
page.content: { Banchory-Devenick}is a{rural}area and many local jobs are related to { {farm-work}- shepherd, tractor-driver, stockman, building maintenance, dairy- man. There is a coal-merchant, joiner and carpenter, post-mistress, plumber, electician, hair-dresser, musician, bar-maid, riding instructor, teacher, entertainer and video shop owner. There is a{chicken factory}which employs local people. Because of the{Oil Business}many people work at oil related jobs or have jobs in the city of Aberdeen which is flourishing because of the prosperity. They travel to work each day. A number of people in this area are{self-employed.}Only the local school teachers,the doctor and the milkman come into the area to work.
